Flask(0.12) - micro web framework
	Jinja2(2.9.6) - template engine
		MarkupSafe(1.0) - unicode subclass that supports HTML strings

	Werkzeug(0.12.1) - WSGI utility library
	itsdangerous(0.24) - helpers to pass trusted data to untrusted environments and back

gTTS(1.1.8) - Google Text to Speech
	gTTS-token(1.1.1) - calculates a token to run the Google Translate text to speech
	requests(2.13.0) - Non-GMO HTTP library

Mechanize(0.3.1) - stateful programmatic web browsing
	click(6.7) - A simple wrapper around optparse for powerful command line utilities
	html5lib(0.999) - HTML parser based on the WHATWG HTML specification
	six(1.10.0) - Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities
	webencodings(0.5) - Character encoding aliases for legacy web content

SimpleCV - computer vision library
	CV - computer vision library
	NumPy - general-purpose array-processing package
	PIL - Python Imaging Library (image processing capabilities)
	pkg_resources - part of setuptools(package development process library)
	PyGame - modules designed for writing video games
	SciPy - scientific computing library

PyKeyboard - module for keyboard control
PyMouse - module for mouse control

timeout-decorator - function decorator(attribute) for timeout
